p: Prepare the title compound in a manner analogous to the procedure set forth in Preparation 64, using 2-[4-(4,4,5,5-tetramethyl-[1,3,2]dioxaborolan-2-yl)-phenyl]-ethylamine (567 mg, 2 mmol), triethylamine (0.836 mL, 6 mmol) and 2-fluorobenzene sulfonyl chloride (467 mg, 2.4 mmol). Mass spectrum (ES+) = 406.0 (M+1).
